snippet.title: While We Wait Here - Demo Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
While We Wait Here demo can now be played on Steam ᐅ https://store.steampowered.com/app/2213120/While_We_Wait_Here/

From the creators of Ravenous Devils comes this new story-driven psychological horror with multiple endings. 

It’s just an ordinary day at Nora and Cliff’s diner; you’re in the middle of nowhere, flipping burgers, serving drinks, and enjoying good old fashioned conversation…

Then suddenly, a regular summer’s day is turned upside down with the arrival of a frighteningly giant storm. Some play it off, others believe it may actually be the beginning of the end. 

Nothing, in either case, is really what it seems.

Music by CO.AG

#whilewewaithere #WhileWeWaitHere #WWWH #BadVicesGames
